p: A Varian 450-GC fitted with an MS240 iontrap MS and a Combipal autosampler (Varian Instruments, Sunnyvale, CA, USA) and run with a nonpolar Varian FactorFour VF-5ms column (30 m × 0.25 mm ID, 0.25 μm film) commonly used for the analysis of VOCs was used under the same conditions to assist in compound identification.
